title: Mortimer Beckett and the Secrets of Spooky Manor - Hidden Object
description:
Mortimer Beckett and the Secrets of Spooky Manor
    *  Unlimited Play
    * 30 Rooms to Explore
    * Tons of Items to Find
    * Brain-Bending Puzzles to Solve
    * Gorgeous Graphics and Immersive Storyline
System Requirements
Windows:

- Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista
- 500MHz or faster Processor (800MHz for Vista)
- 128MB RAM (512MB for Vista)
- 16MB Video Card with 3D Hardware Acceleration
- DirectX 8.0 or better (9.0 for Vista)
